biotools.summary: Software package for reconciling assemblies produced by de novo short-read assemblers such as SOAPdenovo and ALLPATHS-LG. The goal of assembly reconciliation, or “metassembly,” is to combine multiple assemblies into a single genome that is superior to all of its constituents.

bioschemas.name: Metassembler
bioschemas.summary: Software package for reconciling assemblies produced by de novo short-read assemblers such as SOAPdenovo and ALLPATHS-LG. The goal of assembly reconciliation, or “metassembly,” is to combine multiple assemblies into a single genome that is superior to all of its constituents.
